###  kernel-ltlt=long-term

	yum --enablerepo=elrepo-kernel install kernel-lt -y

	vim /etc/grub.conf

	# Note that you do not have to rerun grub after making changes to this file

	#          kernel /boot/vmlinuz-version ro root=/dev/sda1
	#          initrd /boot/initrd-[generic-]version.img

	default=0
	timeout=5
	splashimage=(hd0,0)/boot/grub/splash.xpm.gz

Post.author: QwerSe
Post.title: awk
Post._content:
awk

awk



```
#awk -F: '{print $1}' /etc/passwd
root
bin
daemon
adm
lp
sync
shutdown
halt
mail
operator
games
ftp
nobody
systemd-bus-proxy
systemd-network
dbus
sshd

```



---

awkif

- 

  ##### <    <=    ==     !=     >=    ~     !~

- 

  ```
  awk -F: '{if (1~/root/)   print 0}' /etc/passwd

  awk -F: '$1~/root/' /etc/passwd

  root0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash

  ```

  

  

  

  #####  

- 

  `awk -F: '{if($3=="0") print $0}' /etc/passwd`

  print $0if

  ```
  root0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash

  print 0  print $3 0
  ```

- 

  `awk -F: '$3 != "0"' /etc/passwd`

  

  ```
  bin:x:1:1:bin:/bin:/sbin/nologin
  daemon:x:2:2:daemon:/sbin:/sbin/nologin
  adm:x:3:4:adm:/var/adm:/sbin/nologin
  lp:x:4:7:lp:/var/spool/lpd:/sbin/nologin
  sync:x:5:0:sync:/sbin:/bin/sync
  shutdown:x:6:0:shutdown:/sbin:/sbin/shutdown
  halt:x:7:0:halt:/sbin:/sbin/halt
  mail:x:8:12:mail:/var/spool/mail:/sbin/nologin
  operator:x:11:0:operator:/root:/sbin/nologin
  games:x:12:100:games:/usr/games:/sbin/nologin
  ftp:x:14:50:FTP User:/var/ftp:/sbin/nologin
  nobody:x:99:99:Nobody:/:/sbin/nologin
  systemd-bus-proxy:x:999:998:systemd Bus Proxy:/:/sbin/nologin
  systemd-network:x:998:997:systemd Network Management:/:/sbin/nologin
  dbus:x:81:81:System message bus:/:/sbin/nologin
  sshd:x:74:74:Privilege-separated SSH:/var/empty/sshd:/sbin/nologin
  ```

  :$30

- 

  `cat 2 |awk -F: '{if($3==$4) print $1,$3,$4}'`

  

  ```
  root 0 0
  bin 1 1
  daemon 2 2
  nobody 99 99
  dbus 81 81
  sshd 74 74

  ```

  <>

- 

  `cat 2 |awk -F: '$1 ~ /^root/'`

  

  `root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash`

- 

   && 

   ||

    !

  shell

  `cat 2 |awk -F: '{if(1==1 && 2==3)print $0}'`

  0&&

  ||

   

  ---

  AWK

- awk

  ```
  -gsub(r,s) $0sr #awk 'gsub(/root/,1234)' {print $0} /etc/passwd
  -gsub(r,s,t) tsr  #awk  'gsub(/root/,"deng") {print $0}' /etc/passwd #deng
  -index(s,t) st # awk  '{print index("qwerse","e")}'
  -length(s) s awk  '{print length($0)}' /etc/passwd
  -match(s,r) sr #awk -F: 'BEGIN {print match("root1",root)}'
  -split(s,a,fs) fssa #awk  'BEGIN {print split("qwerasdrfdsfr",a,"r") }END{print a[2]}'  /dev/null
  -printf(fmt,exp) fmtexp cat 2 | awk -F: '{print $3=sprintf("%20d",$3)}'



  ```

Post.title: rsync+inotify()
Post._content:
### 



#### rsync+cron
 
cps  rsyncrsyncrsynclinux
    
#### inotify
     Inotify linux2.6.13InotifyInotify
     inotify-tools
     
    	rsynccrontabinotify
    rsync
    
####  inotifyinotify-tools
##### 1. 

    [root@uplook ~]# ll /proc/sys/fs/inotify
     0
    -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 0 10-01 08:07 max_queued_events
    -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 0 10-01 08:07 max_user_instances
    -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 0 10-01 08:07 max_user_watches
    
##### 2 rsyncinotify-tools

    http://inotify-tools.sourceforge.net
    inotify-tools
    [root@uplook ~]# tar xf inotify-tools-3.14.tar.gz 
    [root@uplook ~]# cd inotify-tools-3.14
    [root@uplook inotify-tools-3.14]# ./configure && make && make install

inotify-tools:
  
   inotifywait		
   inotifywatch		inotify
    

#### inotifywait
Inotifywaitshell

    -m --monitor
    -r  	--recursive
    -q 	--quiet
    -e 	--eventmodifydeletecreateattrib
    




    [root@uplook ~]# inotifywait -mrq -e modify,delete,create,attrib /var/www/html/
    
    [root@uplook ~]# inotifywait -mrq --timefmt '%d/%m/%y %H:%M' --format '%T %w%f' -e modify,delete,create,attrib /var/www/html/
    04/06/14 14:23 /var/www/html/file1
    04/06/14 14:23 /var/www/html/file1

    [root@uplook ~]# nohup inotifywait -mrq --timefmt '%d/%m/%y %H:%M' --format '%T %w%f' -e modify,delete,create,attrib /var/www/html >> file_modify.txt&
    
    [root@uplook ~]# inotifywait -mrq --format '%w%f' -e modify,delete,create,attrib /var/www/html/
    /var/www/html/file2
    /var/www/html/file2



#### 

			            192.168.5.11		()
						/var/www/html


	web2 192.168.5.16   web3 192.168.5.2
	/var/www/html			 /var/www/html


 hosts

    [root@source ~]# cat /etc/hosts
    127.0.0.1   		localhost
    192.168.5.11   source
    192.168.5.16   web2
    192.168.5.2     web3
        
ssh

    [root@source ~]# ssh-keygen
    [root@source ~]# ssh-copy-id -i web2
    [root@source ~]# ssh-copy-id -i web3
    [root@source ~]# ssh web2 date;ssh web3 date
    2015 09 29  11:31:19 CST
    2015 09 29  11:33:07 CST
    
 inotify-tools
[root@source ~]# yum -y install rsync httpd
[root@source ~]# tar xf inotify-tools-3.14.tar.gz 
[root@source ~]# cd inotify-tools-3.14
[root@source inotify-tools-3.14]# ./configure && make && make install


  [root@source ~]# cat /root/rsync_inotify.sh
           
    #!/bin/bash																									
    web2=192.168.5.16																						
    web3=192.168.5.2        																				
    src=/var/www/html/																						
    dst=/var/www/html/																						
    																													
    inotifywait -mrq  --format '%w%f' -e modify,delete,create,attrib $src \				
    | while read file																						
    do																													
    	    																						                    
                    rsync -avzHXA --delete $src root@$web2:$dst &>/dev/null	        
                    rsync -avzHXA --delete $src root@$web3:$dst &>/dev/null    	    
         		        																						        
    																													
    done																												
    
    [root@source ~]# chmod a+x /root/rsync_inotify.sh
    [root@source ~]# nohup /root/rsync_inotify.sh &
    
    
    web2, web3
    [root@web2 ~]# yum -y install rsync httpd
    [root@web3 ~]# yum -y install rsync httpd

Post.title: ngrok
Post._content:
ngrok22
linuxwindowsandeskngrok

####1gongrokgo



1go

```
wget http://qwerse.hk.ufileos.com/go1.4.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz
```

2

```
tar -zxvf go1.4.2.linux-386.tar.gzmv go /usr/local/
```

3go/usr/bin

```
ln -s /usr/local/go/bin/* /usr/bin/
```

#### 2gitgit

1git2.6git

```
yum -y install zlib-devel openssl-devel perl hg cpio expat-devel gettext-devel curl curl-devel perl-ExtUtils-MakeMaker hg wget gcc gcc-c++
```

2git

```

```

```
wget https://www.kernel.org/pub/software/scm/git/git-2.6.0.tar.gz
```

3git

```
tar zxvf git-2.6.0.tar.gz
```

4git

```
cd git-2.6.0./configure --prefix=/usr/local/gitmakemake install
```

5git

```
ln -s /usr/local/git/bin/* /usr/bin/
```



#### 3,ngrok

ngrok

```
cd ~/your_download_dir
git clone https://github.com/inconshreveable/ngrok.git ngrok
cd ngrok
```



`NGROK_BASE_DOMAIN`
`aevit.your-domain.com``NGROK_BASE_DOMAIN``your-domain.com`
`aevit.ngrok.your-domain.com``NGROK_BASE_DOMAIN``ngrok.your-domain.com`

`ngrok.your-domain.com`

```
openssl genrsa -out rootCA.key 2048
openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -key rootCA.key -subj "/CN=ngrok.your-domain.com" -days 5000 -out rootCA.pem
openssl genrsa -out device.key 2048
openssl req -new -key device.key -subj "/CN=ngrok.your-domain.com" -out device.csr
openssl x509 -req -in device.csr -CA rootCA.pem -CAkey rootCA.key -CAcreateserial -out device.crt -days 
```

`ngrok`6

```
device.crt
device.csr
device.key
rootCA.key
rootCA.pem
rootCA.srl
```

`ngrok``bindata`ngrok`assets`(`ngrokd``ngrok`) `assets/client/tls`  `assets/server/tls` `ngrok``ngrokd`****(****)

```
cp rootCA.pem assets/client/tls/ngrokroot.crt
cp device.crt assets/server/tls/snakeoil.crt
cp device.key assets/server/tls/snakeoil.key
```

linux

```
make clean

# 32 GOARCH=386
GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 make release-server release-client
```

`bin``ngrokd``ngrok`
`bin/ngrokd`
`bin/ngrok``GOOS`64linux`mac``win`



#####

```
/usr/local/ngrok/bin/ngrokd -domain="$NGROK_DOMAIN" -httpAddr=":80"
```

#####

`ngrok`

```
vim ngrok.cfg
```

:

```
server_addr: "ngrok.your-domain.com:4443"
trust_host_root_certs: false
tunnels:
  example:
   subdomain: "example" #
   proto:
    http: 80 #ip
    https: 80
  web:
   subdomain: "web" #
   proto:
    http: 192.168.1.100:80 #ip
    https: 192.168.1.100:80
 
  ssh:
   remote_port: 50001 #tcp
   proto:
    tcp: 22 #22
```

ngrok
```
./ngrok -config=./ngrok.cfg -subdomain=blog 80  #80blog.ngrok.your-domain.com
./ngrok -config ngrok.cfg start ssh  #ssh
```

import requests,re
import json
from urllib.parse import urlencode
from requests.exceptions import RequestException
from bs4 import  BeautifulSoup
from multiprocessing import Process

def index_html(sum,keys):

    ''''''
    url_keys ={
        'offset':sum,
        'format':'json',
        'keyword':keys,
        'autoload':'true',
        'count':'20',
        'cur_tab':'3',
        'from':'gallery'
    }
    header = {
        "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.13; rv:55.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/55.0"
    }
    url = 'https://www.toutiao.com/search_content/?' + urlencode(url_keys)
    try:

        wangye_index = requests.get(url,headers=header)
        if wangye_index.status_code == 200:
            return wangye_index.text
        return None
    except RequestException:
        print ('')
        return None


def ajax_json(ajax):
    ''''''
    data = json.loads(ajax)
    if data and 'data' in data.keys():
        for i in data.get('data'):
            yield i.get('article_url')


def info_html(url):
    ''''''
    header = {
        "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.13; rv:55.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/55.0"
    }
    try:
        wangzhi = requests.get(url,headers=header)
        if wangzhi.status_code == 200:
            return wangzhi.text
        return None
    except RequestException:
        print ('')
        return None

def image_url(tupian):
    ''''''
    title_test = BeautifulSoup(tupian,'lxml')
    title = title_test.select('title')[0].get_text()
    jiexi = re.compile('gallery:\sJSON.parse\((.*?)\),', re.S)
    jieguo_1 = re.search(jiexi, tupian)

    jieguo = (jieguo_1.group(1))

    a = jieguo.replace('\\', '')

    tt = re.compile('"(http.*?)"', re.S)

    tt_url = re.findall(tt, a)
    cishu = 0
    for i in tt_url:
        cishu += 1
        if cishu % 4 == 0:

            yield [title,i]


def file_xie(t):

    ''''''


    global sum_c
    sum_c +=1
    a = t[0]
    c = requests.get(t[1])
    with open(a[:6]+str(sum_c)+'.jpg','wb') as f:
        f.write(c.content)
        f.close()
    print ("")









def main(i):
    wangye_ajax = index_html(i,'')
    url = ajax_json(wangye_ajax)
    for i in url:
        tail_html = info_html(i)
        for x in image_url(tail_html):
            file_xie(x)

sum_c = 0
if __name__ == '__main__':
	''''''
	
	p = Process(target=main, args=(0,))
	b = Process(target=main, args=(20,))
	p.start()
	b.start()

```

```
import requests 
from  bs4 import BeautifulSoup as shop
import re, time
import os
import pyvips

from selenium import webdriver #js

tong =[1]
driver = webdriver.PhantomJS(executable_path='C:\\pjs\\bin\\phantomjs.exe')
tou_url = 'http://www.shenmanhua.com'
head ={ "Accept":"text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;",
            "Accept-Encoding":"gzip",
            "Accept-Language":"zh-CN,zh;q=0.8",
            "Referer":"http://www.www.baidu.com/",
            "User-Agent":"Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/42.0.2311.90 Safari/537.36"
            }
def get_html(url):
	''''''
    
    wangye = requests.get(url,headers=head)
    return wangye.text
def js(url):
     '''js'''
        
    driver.get(url)
    
    return driver.page_source
def one():
	''''''
    for i in range(1,275):
        head_url = 'http://www.shenmanhua.com/all_p{}.html'.format(str(i))
        head_wangye = get_html(head_url)
        yield head_wangye
def two(url):
	
    wangye = get_html(url)
    c = shop(wangye,'lxml')
    d = c.title.string
    dirname = d.split(' ')[0]
    #
    File_Path = os.getcwd()+'\\'+dirname
    if not os.path.exists(File_Path):
        
        os.makedirs(File_Path)
    tong[0] = File_Path
    
    f = c.select('ul > li > a[title]')
    html_3 = three(f)
    sum_1 = 1
    
    for i in html_3:
        kong = []
  
        
        txt_html = get_html(i)
        if sum_1 == 1:
            
            js_html = js(i)
            txt_html = js_html
            sum_1 = 0        
        
        
        #h = i.get('title') #
        kong.append(txt_html)
        
        #kong.append(h)
           
        yield kong
        
def three(f):
	''''''
    
    for i in f:
        g = i.get('href') #0
        uurl = tou_url + g
        yield uurl
            

def mh_info(x):
    #mh_info
    sum_fire = 1
    fire = []
    for ii in x:
        
        zz = re.compile('mh_info=\{(.*?)\};',re.S)
        to = re.compile('totalimg:(\d+)',re.S)
        im = re.compile('imgpath:"(.*?)"',re.S)
        pa = re.compile('pagename:"(.*?)"',re.S)
        
        mh_p = (zz.search(ii[0]).group(1))
        totalimg = (to.search(mh_p).group(1))
        imgpath = (im.search(mh_p).group(1))
        pagename = (pa.search(mh_p).group(1))
        
        
        
        fire.append(totalimg)
        fire.append(pagename)
        if sum_fire == 1:

main()

## apache2.4
httpdapr, apr-util

aprapache portable runtimehttpd

    httpd-2.4 1.4apr

        apr-1.5.0.tar.bz2
        apr-util-1.5.3.tar.bz2
        httpd-2.4.9.tar.bz2
    
        pcre-devel
        openssl-devel     


    2 
    # yum install gcc
    # yum install pcre-devel
    
    # tar xf apr-1.5.0.tar.bz2
    # cd apr-1.5.0
    # ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apr   (--prefixapr)
    # make
    # make  install
    
    # tar xf apr-util-1.5.3.tar.bz2
    # cd apr-util-1.5.3
    # ./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apr-util --with-apr=/usr/local/apr
    # make && make install ###@20160714


    # tar xf httpd-2.4.9.tar.bz2
        
        --sysconfdir=/etc/httpd24  
        --enable-so  
        --enable-ssl ssl
        --enable-cgi cgiweb
        --enable-rewrite  url     --Author : Leshami
        --with-zlib         --Blog   : http://blog.csdn.net/leshami
        --with-pcre  
        --with-apr=/usr/local/apr  apr
        --with-apr-util=/usr/local/apr-util/  apr-util
        --enable-modules=most      
        --enable-mpms-shared=all   
        --with-mpm=prefork         httpdprefork
    
    # cd httpd-2.4.9
    # ./configure                           \
        --with-apr=/usr/local/apr           \
        --with-apr-util=/usr/local/apr-util \
        --prefix=/usr/local/apache \
        --sysconfdir=/etc/httpd24  \
        --enable-so                \
        --enable-ssl               \
        --enable-cgi               \
        --enable-rewrite           \
        --with-zlib                \
        --with-pcre                \
        --with-mpm=prefork         \
        --enable-modules=most      \
        --enable-mpms-shared=all   
    
    # make 
    # make install

/boot df -h /boot100%

		apt





		/boot/bootaptbug/boot




#### /boot

		

- /dev/sda1      /boot      500M
- /dev/sda2     /                400G
- /dev/dm-0    swap         4G
- /dev/sda3                        2G   #/boot

#####ext4,

	gpartedsudo apt-get install gparted

linux

##### /boot/boot



	

	/mntsudo mount /dev/sda3 /mnt 

	/bootsudo rsync -av /boot/ /mnt/

	/bootsudo umount /boot

	mntsudo umount /mnt

	/bootsudo mount /dev/sda3 /boot

##### /etc/fstab

	UUIDsudo lbkid	 #/dev/sda3UUID

	

			UUID=883fa013-48ba-473e-b8bc-5c4d910872ff	/boot	ext4	defaults	02

			UUIDUUID



###sudo apt-get install -f
